CVE-2019-10856.reason: The CVE interface prompts that this vulnerability is caused by another vulnerability that has not been completely repaired. The main code for repairing these two vulnerabilities on GitHub is notebook/auth/login.py

CVE-2019-10795.reason: The Github interface gives the language information, and the code changes are consistent with the known Affected Software Configurations on the CVE report.

CVE-2021-29469.reason: Node.js information is given in the CVE interface, JavaScript is located, and the component of the code modified in GitHub is node-redis.

CVE-2021-32641.reason: GitHub page positioning language information, component information is obtained through CVE's Description information

CVE-2017-16618.reason: GitHub page location language information, confirm affected components from Know Affected Software Configurations

CVE-2022-30284.reason: GitHub page location language information, confirm affected components from Know Affected Software Configurations
